title: Hamedan's Igneous and Metamorphic Zone
content: Hamedan's granite mass has created widespread metamorphic events. This mass has moved into the near formations during the cretaceous period and created spectacular metamorphic and igneous phenomena. Abbas Abad and Ganjnamé valleys, as well as Ganjnamé road to the town of Serkan, are among the areas in which these phenomena can be seen. Near the village of Zaman Abad also some outcrops valuable for igneous and metamorphic petrological researches can be seen.
